Package de.lases.control.backing

Class ToolbarBacking

java.lang.Object
de.lases.control.backing.ToolbarBacking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@ViewScoped @Named public class ToolbarBacking extends Object implements Serializable
Backing bean for the toolbar view. This view belongs to the submission page.
See Also:
Serialized Form

      public void setReviewedByInput​(ReviewedBy reviewedByInput)
      Set meta information about the reviewer that is supposed to be added. This is used to set a deadline for the new reviewer.
      Parameters:
      reviewedByInput - Meta information about the new reviewer.
